title: Bug 102623: Image cannot be refreshed after importing again
OB: Image cannot be refreshed after importing again. Steps to reproduce: 1. Import new "image1.jpg" into layout again. Expected result: The new image should be displayed. Actual result: The original image is still displayed.
EB: Import new "image1.jpg" into layout again. Expected result: The new image should be displayed. Actual result: The original image is still displayed.
SR: 1. Open the layout. 2. Import the image "image1.jpg" into the layout. 3. Verify that the original image is displayed. 4. Import the image "image1.jpg" into the layout again. 5. Verify that the new image is not displayed, and the original image is still shown.
